title: Boards = riots way of hiding OCE CANCER!
body:
So riot realised they couldn't do anything about the community voicing their concerns about the CANCER OCE COMMUNITY!

So what do they do?

SHUT IT DOWN LOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOL!

LETS JUST SWEEP IT UNDER THE TABLE!

TRIBUNAL COMING BEEN COMING FOR 2 YRS ACCORDING TO RIOT LOLOLOLOL!

replies.body: I agree I would love to have the Tribunal but there are tonnes of things that I would much prefer than that to come first and I am sure that's exactly the reason why Riot have been waiting to do it. I mean it was what 3-4 years before it was even implemented into League to start with
Do you even keep up with any of the announcements? Tribunal was removed from ALL servers while a new version is worked on.

yup been worked on for 2 fking yrs? lol! 

only coxsuckers who like to suck on riot would still side with them!

And you just proved you know nothing.
Go read Riot's posts and learn you pathetic twat.

OCE never launched with a Tribunal (and it's only a year old now, so I don't know where you are getting this two years horse%%%% from), this year about 1/4 to 1/3 in they removed Tribunal from all servers and started working on a new system. With it includes a bunch of automated systems that so far have only been tested on NA (you know the largest LoL server with the highest population so the best grounds for testing new %%%%). These automated systems instantly ban people who talk like you, pretty funny don't you think?
Oh and hey look at that, just last patch we got a new Leaver Buster system that actually works!

Yup. Riot's totally doing nothing.
And where the cock are you getting this two years crap from anyway? You probably only been playing LoL for as long as the OCE server has existed.

hmmm lets see so oce opens july 2013 and now Dec 2014 that's one yr to you yeh? 18 months!!!!!!!!!! http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2316

1 yr? please suck riots cox more u coxsucker

Yeah that's one year, sounds to me like you're one of those twats that say a baby is 21 months old.
Get over yourself, you've already revealed yourself as nothing more than a lower class troll.

People like you are the reason OCE is cancerous, fool. Riot will get there when they get there, and we as a community need to be patient and wait for when that day arrives. In the meantime, flame all you want at people in game, just don't spread it to the wider community. Then everyone will be fine!
Rather have Victorious Darius; the dream.

at least pretend you're not part of the cancer while complaining about the cancer please

be the change you want to see.
